reviewText:
Haven't been able to play it yet as we in NZ are in Zone 4 and this DVD will only play in Zone 2. Is there anything I  can do>
I was able to see the film on TV some time ago. Just wanted my own copy.
I could not play the DVD. Defective.
Wrong zone - would not even load in my blu-ray player because it came from London!
Unable to watch it.  Message at the beginning states "Not for viewing in this region."  Did not recall any mention of restrictions when purchased.
my type of movie, and no two ways about it
saw it before.awsome movie ..but bought from comapny in uk and movie would not play here in US!
